tasks.task: Harvest and analyze sunflower for spiral counts and height. Subtasks: Identify mature sunflower, measure height, remove seed head, count spirals clockwise, count spirals counterclockwise, verify Fibonacci numbers.)

subtasks: Wait for sunflowers to mature (petals fallen, seeds visible)

tasks.task: Measure the height of the sunflower
subtasks: Measure from base to the middle of the head
Note the exact height (using a measuring tape or stick)

tasks.task: Harvest the seed head of a sunflower
subtasks: Use scissors or hands to carefully remove the head
Ensure no damage to the seeds

tasks.task: Count the spirals in a sunflower seed head
subtasks: Brush off the head to expose seeds
Start counting spirals in one direction (e.g., clockwise)
Number each spiral to avoid missing
Check count with a partner (Rimmer checking here)
Count spirals in the opposite direction (counterclockwise)

tasks.task: Identify a mature sunflower and perform spiral counts**
Analyze a mature sunflower for spiral counts and height
Analyze a mature sunflower’s spiral counts and height
Analyze a mature sunflower for spiral counts and height. Subtasks: Identify maturity, measure height, harvest seed head, count clockwise spirals, note mold issues.)
